summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 DODGE CARAVAN. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE ENGINE STARTED INDEPENDENTLY. THE CONTACT MENTIONED THAT THE REMOTE CAR STARTER MAY HAVE BEEN THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 14,400.   UPDATED 12/9/14*CN  UPDATED 10/1/2015*JS
